name: AppStorage
desc: A property wrapper type that reflects a value from UserDefaults and invalidates a view on a change in value in that user default.

items.name: init(wrappedValue: Value, String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write to a string user default.

items.name: init(wrappedValue: Value, String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write to an integer user default, transforming that to RawRepresentable data type.

items.name: init(wrappedValue: Value, String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write to a user default as data.

items.name: init(wrappedValue: Value, String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write to an integer user default.

items.name: init(wrappedValue: Value, String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write to a string user default, transforming that to RawRepresentable data type.

items.name: init(wrappedValue: Value, String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write to a url user default.

items.name: init(wrappedValue: Value, String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write to a double user default.

items.name: init(wrappedValue: Value, String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write to a boolean user default.

items.name: init(String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write an Optional integer user default.

items.name: init(String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write an Optional string user default.

items.name: init(String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write an Optional double user default.

items.name: init<R>(String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can save and restore an Optional integer, transforming it to an Optional RawRepresentable data type.

items.name: init<R>(String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can save and restore an Optional string, transforming it to an Optional RawRepresentable data type.

items.name: init(String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write an Optional data user default.

items.name: init(String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write an Optional boolean user default.

items.name: init(String, store: UserDefaults?)
items.desc: Creates a property that can read and write an Optional URL user default.
